divs: sighting detailssighting report: hi there, i was about 8 years old maybe when this happened but i am not exactly sure of the year or time. it was a colder morning, i think in early spring maybe in march or april? but it follows as this, i use to wake up in the morning extra early just to watch gi-joe and mario brothers on tv at 5am. i woke up as the first 5am show was almost ending one morning and ran to the living room, which looked down into a valley (this took place in colville, wa where i use to live) and it had huge windows that spanned the entire room so anything outside you couldnt have missed. i made it half way to the tv i remember and just froze. it was nearly pitch black out, no lights in the house were on yet as i was the only one up still. i felt compelled to turn to my left and look out the windows where i saw pulsateing, circluateing lights, they would all be on but would get brighter and go in a big around in a big circle and semi reflected off of whatever the lights were on, it was cicular in s hape with the red lights being near the edges of the object. i ran to the center window of the house and watched as it appoarched maybe double treetop level. it moved maybe only a 40mph pace or so and then i noticed the other 3, which appeared to be helicopters or something similar to them, they had fast rotating and human like normal yellow light on the front and typical a faint light at the rear. my first thought was they were escorting the object in a triangular pattern, all about the same distance to it. but all very close. i could make rotations of the blades or something on the 3 "helicopters" but they didnt make any noise. i didnt realize this untill later. it was totaly silent. as they passed over my house i ran to the front windows but didnt have a good view because of trees. i saw them go a possible 1\4 and then all turn left up over the hills and mountains and disappeared rather quickly at that point. i was just frozen and i remember my mother waking up and turning on the kitchen light and asking what i was looking at, i said nothing and went to get dressed.. similiar sightings involved i thought a pair of "red eyes" in the woods which i saw from the school bus, very near my house and a couple times saw a silver object that would be high in sky over town but never reall seemed to move but would disappear evantually. and those are my accounts, but apparenly they dont like to come around pittsburgh where i live now... just back west.. travis meese
